thread.section_title: CardKangaroo.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CardKangaroo.com | cardkangaroo.com | 5 of 78
thread.title: Patrick

author: Patrick
title: Patrick
text: When I first saw this site online, I figured I'd probably get sc***ed. But, it was only a $25 gift certificate that I would never, ever use. So, I decided to give it a shot. It was about as painless of a process as I've ever experienced online. Would definitely recommend CardKangaroo.com and I will definitely be sending my BassPro, Chili's, and CrackerBarrel cards their way from now on.
